channel.title: 639 .Sh compiler on Centos
channel.description:
How to get a .sh compiler for Code:
C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_21/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/org/dementhium/*.java
is the .bat version

item.title: 639 .Sh compiler on Centos
item.dc:creator: @MonkeyMad MonkeyMad
item.description:
@MonkeyMad wrote:

what?

is what i currently have, but when i try to compile i get

"Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: lib/mysql/jar Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: lib.mysql.jar at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:217) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:205) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:321) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:294) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:266) Could not find the main class: lib/mysql.jar. Program will exit. compile.sh: line 1: -sourcepath: command not found"

Read full topic
